name: Bolt Brasil
tagline: Bolt Brasil is a digital marketing specialized
description:
Born and raised in the digital world. Today, a presentation specialized, digital oriented communication agency.
In 17 years of existence, we have experienced how the digital era redefined the way brands communicate in different levels. So, our services range expanded over time - communication intelligence, strategy, branding, design, content, social media, advertising, print, live marketing, digital interfaces and presentations in different formats and platforms.
We bring together business and people, creating possibilities for connections, interactions, knowledge and relationships to grow - in a good, intelligent, strategic way. Always creative. Always new.
Lightning never strikes the same place twice.
